flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.summary: This is your step-by-step guide to building a decorative, soothing, tornado of fog. For under $20, a few minutes rooting around in an electronics salvage bin, and a couple of hours, you can enjoy your own personal science exhibit.
guide.title: DIY Floor-to-Ceiling Tornado of Fog
